releaseNotes: Do more with PayPal, with more power packed into a single app. Shop the world with ease, send payments near and far, and much more. Find what matters to you and keep track of it more easily by downloading the latest version of the app.
description:
There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay

PayPal’s here to brighten up your summer.  Get 3% cashback (up to a max 15GBP per month) on your selected monthly category1. Choose to pay now, pay later or over time.2 Send, receive, split or pool money3, and donate for a good cause – right from your phone

1Promotion runs from 01.07.25 to 30.09.25 and consists of three monthly offer periods. To participate, activate the offer in the PayPal app and select a category each month to earn cashback on eligible purchases, max £15 per month. Terms & exclusions apply.
2PayPal Credit & Pay in 3 subject to status. 18+. PayPal Credit: Representative 23.9% APR (variable). Pay in 3 is unregulated credit. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing. Eligible purchases via PayPal online checkout only.  
3An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY
A simple, secure way to quickly send and receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we help make sure your money transfers are secure

NOW GET 3% CASHBACK
From July to September, get 3% cashback1 (up to a max 15GBP per month) on a monthly category you choose within the app. Pick from Fashion and Retail, Food and Dining, Home and Electronics, and Ground Transport. Each month you can choose a different category or keep it the same

BUY NOW, PAY LATER
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.4

4Pay in 3 is an unregulated credit agreement, so you will have fewer protections under this agreement than you would under a regulated credit agreement. Carefully consider whether the purchase is affordable and how you will make the repayments. Be aware of the possible impact of using Pay in 3 and of missing payments, including making other borrowing more difficult or more expensive

POOL MONEY TOGETHER
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward

SEND MONEY AROUND THE GLOBE
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom.5

5Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT
Add your debit or credit cards or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout.6 You can keep earning your credit card rewards on eligible purchases, when you checkout with PayPal.7

6Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)
7Subject to issuer’s applicable reward program terms and conditions

GET INSTANT SPEND NOTIFICATIONS
Whether shopping at your usual store or somewhere new, we can help keep checkout fast & your eligible purchases protected.8 You also get instant spend notifications, so you can easily keep track of all your online transactions

8Buyer Protection is available on eligible purchases only. Time limits and other terms apply. See the Buyer protection section of your local User Agreement for more information

KEEP YOUR PAYMENTS IN ONE PLACE
Manage your subscriptions & household bills, all from one place

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD
